name: Golem
description: The undisputed king of raw damage output. This massive unit crushes enemy waves with devastating area attacks and incredible range. Essential for late-game domination.
usage: Place in central positions for maximum area coverage. Pair with speed-boosting units.

name: Venus Flytrap
description: A versatile powerhouse that excels in both early and mid-game scenarios. Balanced stats make it the perfect backbone for any defensive strategy.
usage: Excellent all-around unit. Perfect for early economy and mid-game transitions.

name: Ghost Pepper
description: Unleashes scorching fire damage that melts through enemy armor. Watch as your foes burn while you count the victories.
usage: Place behind tanks for protection. Excellent against heavily armored enemies.

name: Money Tree
description: Your economic backbone. While not the strongest fighter, this unit generates passive income to fuel your botanical army.
usage: Place early for economy. Protect with stronger units. Essential for resource management.

name: Potato
description: Reliable and affordable. The potato proves that simple doesn't mean weak. A solid choice for any strategy.
usage: Perfect starter unit. Reliable damage throughout early to mid-game phases.

name: Strawberry
description: Sweet and supportive. Provides healing and damage boost to nearby allied units.
usage: Place near your strongest units to maximize their potential. Essential for sustained battles.

name: Cactus
description: Spiky and resilient. Reflects damage back to attackers while maintaining steady defensive pressure.
usage: Great for chokepoints. Let enemies hurt themselves while you build up stronger units.

name: Sunflower
description: The humble beginning. While weak in combat, sunflowers provide essential early-game economy.
usage: Only for desperate early economy. Replace as soon as possible with Money Trees.
